mapper.select: select * from location order by location asc

select r.recruit_no, r.title, r.field, r.location, r.age,recruiting_start,recruiting_end,r.content, r.member_no, to_char(r.time_posted,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as time_posted,m.name,r.hit from recruit r, member m where r.recruit_no=#{value} and r.member_no=m.member_no
mapper.insert:
select ymv_seq.nextval from dual
insert into recruit(recruit_no,title,field,location,age,recruiting_start,recruiting_end,content,member_no,time_posted,hit,volunteering_start_date,volunteering_end_date,volunteering_start_time,volunteering_end_time) values(#{recruitNo},#{title},#{field},#{location},#{age},#{recruitingStart},#{recruitingEnd},#{content},#{memberNo}, sysdate ,0,#{volunteeringStartDate},#{volunteeringEndDate},#{volunteeringStartTime},#{volunteeringEndTime})
mapper.update: update recruit set title=#{title},content=#{content},recruiting_start=to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),recruiting_end=to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),field=#{field} ,location=#{location} ,age=#{age} where recruit_no=#{recruitNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from recruit where member_no=#{value}

select recruit_no, title, field, location, age, recruiting_start,recruiting_end from(select recruit_no, title, field, location, age, recruiting_start, recruiting_end, CEIL(rownum/5) AS page from(select r.recruit_no, r.title, r.field, r.location, r.age, r.recruiting_start, r.recruiting_end from recruit r , voluntary_service_applicate vsa where r.recruit_no=vsa.recruit_no and vsa.member_no=#{memberNo} order by recruit_no desc) ) where page=#{pageNo}
select count(*) from recruit r , voluntary_service_applicate vsa where r.recruit_no=vsa.recruit_no and vsa.member_no=#{value}
mapper.update: update recruit set hit = hit+1 where recruit_no=#{value}
